data.caption: Reply To Clarification Sought On Price Movement Of The Shares Of The Company
data.news_body: Reply to clarifcation sought on price movement of the shares of the Company

data.caption: Clarification sought from SIL Investments Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from SIL Investments Ltd on October 21, 2024 with reference to significant movement in price, in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.

data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) (Amendments) Regulations, 2018, please find enclosed disclosure of Related Party Transactions, on a consolidated basis, in the format specified in the relevant accounting standards for the period ended 30th September, 2021.

You are requested to take the same on record.
